A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie makes a statement of the political ideology of its writer but he alienates many with the poor treatment of its most beloved characters. We previously had to endure this with Han Solo and now Luke Skywalker. The misguided\, impotent Finn is another victim of this. One doesn't have to diminish a sex or race to elevate the other but in today's liberal extremist environment it does.
